event.title: Talk "Freedom on Android devices" in RMLL/LSM, Montpellier, France
event.body: On July 7th at 11:40 during the RMLL/LSM 2014, Erik Albers will give a speech about freedom on android devices, take back control over your data, and synchronizing them using free software. The talk is held in English, and will be held in Amphi 31 at University of Montpellier II.
